email-max-length: Email must be at most 100 characters
password-min-length: Password must be at least 8 characters
password-lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
password-uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
password-digit: Password must contain at least one digit
password-special-char: Password must contain at least one special character
field-min-length: Field must be at least 3 characters
field-max-length: Field must be at most 50 characters
field-shape: Field must follow the required format
phone-number-digits: Phone number must contain only digits
phone-number-min-length: Phone number must be at least 8 characters
phone-number-max-length: Phone number must be at most 15 characters
arrayNonEmptyNumbers: You have to pick at least one option
arrayNonEmptyImage: You have to upload at least one image
